text: Zinc sulfate is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is ZnSO4. It contains zinc and sulfate ions. ==Properties== Zinc sulfate is a colorless solid. It dissolves in water. It can react with bases to make zinc hydroxide. ==Preparation== Zinc sulfate can be made by reacting zinc or zinc oxide with sulfuric acid. It can also be made by reacting copper sulfate with zinc. ==Uses== Zinc sulfate can be used to add zinc to the soil. It is also used to add zinc to animal feed. It was once used to remove acne. ==Related pages== *Zinc fluoride *Zinc chloride Category:Sulfur compounds Category:Zinc compounds
